title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Updated
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the interactive simulation assistant for virtual reality training. Include desired features, target audience, use cases, technical constraints, integration with existing systems, security considerations, performance requirements, scalability needs, and potential future enhancements. Consider user experience and accessibility in the design.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for virtual reality simulation, real-time interaction, and training content management.

title: Develop Virtual Reality Simulation Engine
description: Implement the core virtual reality simulation engine, including rendering, physics, and user interaction.

title: Develop Training Content Management System
description: Develop a system for creating, managing, and delivering interactive training content for the virtual reality simulations.

title: Implement Real-Time Interaction and Communication
description: Develop the functionality for real-time interaction and communication between the trainer and trainees within the virtual reality environment.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (Revised & Prioritized)
description: In this revised task, we aim to design an intuitive, efficient, accessible, and user-friendly interface and experience for both trainers and trainees within the virtual reality-based training platform. The design will take into account various user roles, accessibility guidelines, usability best practices, project scope, requirements, branding, and visual identity. It will align with the overall project vision and be flexible enough to accommodate future updates. Upon completion, comprehensive documentation of the design decisions and interface elements will be provided. The revised design prioritizes usability, accessibility, and flexibility. We request feedback on this updated description.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure the privacy and integrity of training data and user information.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Configure the development and testing environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, APIs, and development processes for future reference and maintenance.
